mapper.sql: select id, assess_id, follow_id, procurement_type, price, procurement_date, store_id, if_old_new, entirety_price, new_car_price, car_address, purchase_tax, driving_license, registration_certificate, if_add, car_keys, new_car_invoice, quality_guarantee, maintenance_manual, sali, sali_end_date, commercial_insurance, commercial_insurance_end_date, commercial_insurance_price, transport_tax, transport_tax_end_date, customer_name, customer_tel, customer_source, remark, status from car_assess_order
mapper.select: SELECT count(t1.id) FROM car_assess_order t1 INNER JOIN car_assess t2 ON t1.assess_id=t2.id WHERE t2.create_user=#{userId}

SELECT t2.create_user_name create_user, t2.`name` auto_info_name, t2.car_photo mian_photo, t1.create_time, t1.`status`, t1.id, t1.assess_id FROM car_assess_order t1 INNER JOIN car_assess t2 ON t1.assess_id = t2.id WHERE t2.create_user=#{userId} ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC
limit #{startRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{endRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}
